scenario_text.value: I remember this place...

Yeah, we came here when we went looking for
Saki and the others at the dam!

Indeed. There was a gate of some sort, with
an ornate key of conspicuous design.
Yeah! That!

The key we got from Jijimon at the amusement
park had the same kind of design.

Then you think this is the place that Jijimon
was talking about?
Might as well go and find out!
Hey, you! Get your head out of the clouds!

Excuse you? My head’s right here on the
ground, thank you very much!

You’re not being careful enough!
You have to stay vigilant at all times!
Still don’t need to talk to us that way...
Ah, sorry, Shuuji! We’ll be careful!
The heck are you apologizing for?!

What’s the point in fighting now? Let’s just
let him have his way.
Hmph, still doesn’t sit right with me...
Quite right. What an insolent fellow.
Whoopsy! Whoa whoa...
Agumon, are you okay?!

Yeah, I’m okay. It’s just, I dunno what it is
about this place...

Something’s off... Like it’s hard to walk or
something.

Proceed with caution, everyone! We don’t know
what’s lurking around here!
Ah, it’s not safe there! Watch out!

I’ve got eyes, don’t I?! Jeez, you’re
annoying!
I, I’m sorry...

Same as always... You’d think he could be
a little nicer to Lopmon, right?
Who knows what’ll bring him around...
Do you have any ideas, Ryo?
Why’re you asking me?

I mean, you and Kunemon seem to get along
well enough now.
Say what? I don’t see any difference.
Kewkew?

Right? It’s been like this for a while now,
yeah?

(I’d say their relationship’s like night and
day now...)

I wouldn’t say there was any one thing that
did the trick.

Still, one day you just...feel it, you feel
me?
Feel what, exactly?

It’s different from person to person. What
worked for me won’t work for Shuuji, I think.
Is that how it works...?
Still, that Shuuji, man...

At least taking the lead put some pep in his
step...

Damn, it’s hard to walk... If anyone’s tired,
speak up!

And if you see something, say something!
We have no idea what to expect here!
What’s the point in being so cautious now?

There’s this fog, sure, but there ain’t any
enemies around.

Anything could happen! What’ll we do if we
get caught off guard?!

Even just walking here saps your strength.
Keep that up and you’ll wear yourself out.
That, that may be true, but...

You already look pretty tired, Shuuji. You
won’t make it at this rate.
(Miu’s more level-headed than she looks...)

I admit I’m...a little tired...but I can’t
exactly go back now, can I?!

You watch your damn mouth! Just ’cause you’re
tired don’t mean you can take it out on her!
Nnngh...
All right, man, just chill already...

Naw man, he’s totally right this time! Don’t
you snap at Miu!

Whoa now, Shakomon. Things will just get more
complicated if you pile on, too.

If you’re like this already, I’d hate to see
how you’re gonna act down the road...
Like, doesn’t Shuuji seem kinda nasty today?

Ah, keep your voice down, Saki! He’s going to
hear you.

Would that be a bad thing, exactly? He needs
to realize what he’s doing.

“Hey, somebody’s being a real buzzkill on
this trip!” You know?
I guess I agree, but...

(Man, everyone’s getting really resentful
towards Shuuji. This can’t be good...)
(Still, what can I do about it...?)
